episodes.title: Elementary School Musical
episodes.plot: While Homer and Bart accompany Krusty to Oslo so he can receive the Nobel Peace Prize, Marge enrolls Lisa for a week in performing arts camp.

episodes.title: Loan-a Lisa
episodes.plot: Lisa uses the $50 she receives from Grandpa to give Nelson a microloan to jump-start his bicycle business, but soon comes to regret the decision.

episodes.title: MoneyBart
episodes.plot: Lisa takes over as manager of Bart's baseball team and uses statistical analysis to build a winner, but she takes all of the fun out of it and causes Bart to quit the team.

episodes.title: Treehouse of Horror XXI
episodes.plot: A Satanic board game causes other popular board games to come to life, Homer and Marge rescue a possible killer and let him on their boat, and a parody of "Twilight" where Lisa falls for a young vampire.

episodes.title: Lisa Simpson, This Isn't Your Life
episodes.plot: When Lisa discovers that Marge was also a model student, she tries to find out where everything changed so that she doesn't repeat her mistakes. Meanwhile, a series of chance accidents cause Bart to replace Nelson as school bully.

episodes.title: The Fool Monty
episodes.plot: After Mr. Burns finds out that he is dying, he has an accident and loses his memory, and all the townspeople use the situation to get their revenge on him.

episodes.title: How Munched Is That Birdie in the Window?
episodes.plot: Bart adopts a carrier pigeon, but Santa's Little Helper eats it.

episodes.title: The Fight Before Christmas
episodes.plot: Marge gets depressed when the rest of the family does not get into the holiday spirit, and she writes a letter, hoping to get some help; Mr. Burns and Moe's new friend delay the Simpsons as they attempt to travel to Hawaii for the holiday.

episodes.title: Donnie Fatso
episodes.plot: Homer goes to prison after attempting to get out of a series of fines with a bribe, but agrees to a reduced sentence by informing on Fat Tony for the FBI.

episodes.title: Moms I'd Like to Forget
episodes.plot: Bart sets out to uncover the origins of a sword-shaped scar on his hand; Marge reconnects with three friends she fell out with years ago.

episodes.title: Flaming Moe
episodes.plot: Moe tries to keep his 'straightness' a secret when he opens a gay bar; Skinner falls for a new teacher.

episodes.title: Homer the Father
episodes.plot: Homer picks up parenting advice from an 80s sitcom; Bart becomes involved in trading nuclear secrets.

episodes.title: The Blue and the Gray
episodes.plot: Moe employs Homer as his wing man, only to find Homer has more luck with the ladies than he does; Marge finds her first gray hair.

episodes.title: Angry Dad: The Movie
episodes.plot: Bart's "Angry Dad" character gets his own movie, but when the movie starts winning awards, Homer tries to hog all the credit.

episodes.title: The Scorpion's Tale
episodes.plot: Lisa's school project leads to the discovery of a new drug that makes the elderly less cranky and more tolerable.

episodes.title: A Midsummer's Nice Dreams
episodes.plot: After Tommy Chong walks away from the Cheech & Chong reunion tour, Homer goes on the road as his replacement. Meanwhile, Marge tries to help the cat lady with her hoarding problem.

episodes.title: Love Is a Many Strangled Thing
episodes.plot: The tables are turned for Homer and Bart after a therapist cures Homer of his violent tendencies toward the boy.

episodes.title: The Great Simpsina
episodes.plot: The family is greeted by folk singer Ewell Freestone when they visit a peach farm, but when Marge goes overboard with peach-inspired dishes, Lisa and Bart try to get rid of the unwanted fruit. Later, Lisa becomes a magician's apprentice to the legendary Great Raymondo who helps her develop her craft, but a schoolgirl crush clouds her judgment when she is coaxed into revealing the Great Raymondo's most famous magic trick to his phony archnemesis. But when the rival magician's act takes a risky turn, the Great Raymondo has one last trick up his sleeve and stages ...

episodes.title: The Real Housewives of Fat Tony
episodes.plot: Selma falls in love with and marries Fat Tony, and Lisa discovers that Bart has a skill for finding truffles.

episodes.title: Homer Scissorhands
episodes.plot: Homer opens his own salon after he discovers that he has skills as a hair stylist, and Lisa becomes suspicious after Millhouse gets a 5th grade girlfriend.

episodes.title: 500 Keys
episodes.plot: While Homer takes the Duff Blimp for a joyride, Lisa discovers a secret room in the basement of Sprinfield Elementary School.

episodes.title: The Ned-Liest Catch
episodes.plot: When Krabbapple gets suspended and put into detention after hurting Bart, Bart tries to break her out, but it ends that Flanders is the one that saves her life. But soon, Ned figures out that Edna has also dated other men such as Homer, Skinner Comic Book Guy and Aerosmith drummer Joey Kramer.
